Articles.Content:
![DuHOj3g.png](http://i.imgur.com/DuHOj3g.png)
(Uxuser's PFS)

* * *

Sup, Bruhs and Bras! Today here, I have a new idea, so you know how the fairings came out in 1.0? Well, I was thinking we could use fairings in an artistic form! And that is what I have for you Bruhs and Bras today!

First off, these are not whole craft files, these are subassemblies. Although, you can put these in your ship folder, and load then, then add liquid engines to them, but where's the fun in that!?

Second off, most of the subassemblies I will make, will be posted here on the front page. Also, I need your help! Go ahead and message below what Engine, Cockpit, SAS module, you desire, I am NOT make whole entire crafts, only subassemblies.

And without further ado, the subassemblies!:

(I know the below looks like a giant mess, help me, PM me on how to make a spoiler so this doesn't look like a giant mess)

> 
> Mk3 'Aether' Jet Cockpit
> Mass: 13.9
> 
> Crew Capacity: 8
> 
> Parts: 16
> 
> Special: 6 Generators
> 
> Manufacturer:
> 
> Lazarus Aerospace Engineers
> 
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> High performance MK3 Jet cockpit, has 3 nodes for attaching on, and easy mobility. This craft used to be a nuclear bomb, but now it is a jet cockpit, don't worry if you see some radioactive material lying about.
> 
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Pics:
> 
> ![nJyWgS1.png](http://i.imgur.com/nJyWgS1.png)
> 
> ![kEiE3Th.png](http://i.imgur.com/kEiE3Th.png)
> 
> Download: 
> 
> [http://www./download/lhfckwz1qjezk5u/Mk3+%27Aether%27+Jet+Cockpit.craft#39;Aether'_Jet_Cockpit.craft](http://www./download/lhfckwz1qjezk5u/Mk3+%27Aether%27+Jet+Cockpit.craft#39;Aether_Jet_Cockpit.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T02:21:37Z" title="04/29/2015 02:21  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by uxuser**

I like this idea.

Could I request a Falcon 9-style engine cluster?
[I have done something like this before](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113554-Yukon-s-Plane-and-Rocket-Utilities), but the new parts really make my life easier.

> 
> I like this idea.
> Could I request a Falcon 9-style engine cluster?

I'll try my best! What MK do you want it at? (Size)

- - - Next! - - -

> 
> [I have done something like this before](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113554-Yukon-s-Plane-and-Rocket-Utilities), but the new parts really make my life easier.

You had some great ideas too, especially the aerospike back at your page. And the new parts have just blown my mind, now I can give you, and others these fairing subassemblies! Mind if I use inspiration from your aerospike to make one of my own?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T13:54:30Z" title="04/29/2015 01:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by uxuser**
Sure, why not. Happy to inspire others.
Sorry for lack of upload. I'm making a new engine. An aerospike, coming tomorrow or so.
